Advises

Pay attention to the world

  • Unsatisfied needs
  • Talk to people
  • Attend meetups and conferences
  • Barcamp
  • READ !

Store your ideas

  • Note
  • Evernote
  • Google Doc
  • Mobile

Sit in the front row

Say no

job offer or invalid job description

I Believe in Agile

small iteration retrospective achievable targets fast to market

Meet and Talk to Speakers

don’t just sit there, listen to the talk and just left Talk to other attendee during breaks Talk to speaker during break and after the session Most of the speaker does not mind share

Join google groups: - codeaholics - hkror - startuphk
